name: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha A's Portable: The Battle of Aces
name_original: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha A's Portable: The Battle of Aces
description: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha A's Portable: The Battle of Aces (English patched) (魔法少女リリカルなのはA's PORTABLE THE BATTLE OF ACES) is a Fighting video game published by Bandai Namco Games released on January 21st, 2010 for the PlayStation Portable.
